          <title>
            <string language="en">The Celsius scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Celsiusskala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'échelle Celsius</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A escala Célsio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scala centigrado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κλίμακα Κελσίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La escala centígrada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Celsius scale which has been the basis of temperature measurement of substances.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Celsius scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">degrees</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt der Celsiusskala, welches 
die Grundlage des Temperaturmessens der Substanzen gewesen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à l'échelle Celsius 
ce qui a été la base de la mesure de la température des substances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra à escala Célsio qual 
foi a base da medida da temperatura das substâncias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra alla scala centigrado 
quale è stata la base della misura di temperatura delle sostanze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κλίμακα Κελσίου που 
είναι η βάση της μέτρησης θερμοκρασίας των ουσιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a escala centígrada 
cuál ha sido la base de la medida de la temperatura de sustancias.</string>
          </description>
